channel.title: Npc Attack?
channel.description: Hello, Recently on my server I was working on a new training arena. I noticed on whole server, npc's really never fought back. So it's been around 2 hours since I've been fixing it etc. Yet I come across the same problem. The npc's won't hit back. I put them in npc handler correctly. They only hit back if you double click them, and they don't follow. Can anyone help?

item.title: Npc Attack?
item.dc:creator: @H20wnage H20wnage
item.description:
@H20wnage wrote:

well this sounds like there is a bug in the base programing of the npc itself so if u can find where all programing for the npc it should be around attack style and other things but i really think this error is odd maybe its the function that handles retaliate or something else sorry im not alot of help but hey i tried

Read full topic

item.title: Npc Attack?
item.dc:creator: @ApisLord ApisLord
item.description:
@ApisLord wrote:

Hello, Recently on my server I was working on a new training arena. I noticed on whole server, npc’s really never fought back. So it’s been around 2 hours since I’ve been fixing it etc. Yet I come across the same problem. The npc’s won’t hit back. I put them in npc handler correctly. They only hit back if you double click them, and they don’t follow. Can anyone help?
